data.text: @sebongsCaratDan We are sorry for the inconvenience and to hear your frustrations NIca. To assist you further and to check on the concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@Frietz16 Our apologies also for the inconvenience, @Frietz16. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@JhayVil27282863 Be reminded that this will still be part of your 7kgs allowance. This should also fit the overhead bin or under the seat. Thank you
@JhayVil27282863 Hi its me jay! Aside from your hand carry bag, food item that cannot be accepted for check-in may be allowed but will be under the discretion of the airport team also.

@cutlin Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Kathlene. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@ceejeiELF We are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, shane. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@alexhanna71 Hi sam! For domestic flight, you are no longer required to print the boarding pass. You may present the copy of boarding pass saved in your device. Thank you

@RegeSF_17 Our apologies for the inconvenience that you may have felt, Rege. Thank you also for raising the concern. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@llamuses Hi @llamuses! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@travellinkate For now, should you need further assistance, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@travellinkate We are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Kate. Rest assured that we are doing our best to be of better service with our customers.
@peachsunrays Hi Kate! Only TIN ID may be accepted as valid ID for check-in. Thank you
@tsinitashe As for hand carry, it may be accepted but will be under the full discretion and subject for checking of the airport security. Thank you
@tsinitashe Hi Sheryl! Lightstick is allowed for check-in. Just make sure to properly and securely pack it to avoid damages. Batteries are to be removed also and must be properly packed as well.

@travellinkate Hi Kate. I'm sorry to hear about this experience. Thank you for letting us know. We will escalate/check this with the concern team. And, may I know what is your transaction in our ticketing office?

data.text: @monicadoda Hi Doda. We apologize for the late response. Note that ancillary such as baggage, meal, seat, etc. cannot be removed/cancelled anymore once added to a booking whether this is paid or not. You may still settle the amount due up to 2 hours before your flight. Stay safe!
@itsbkdf We are sorry to hear this, Brie. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@rcaryala Hi manchi. We understand your concern. Guest will be accepted for check-in if all requirements of the certain destination is complete. However, Immigration profiling is already beyond our jurisdiction. We hope for your kind understanding.
@CrystalLat_ Hi @CrystalLat_! In that case, passenger may present the original copy of the school ID together with a copy of a PSA Birth Certificate. Thank you

@yooaremymelody We are sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed, JM. If you have any concern related to this, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@DomIgnacio We are truly sorry to hear your frustrations, @DomIgnacio. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@ahningggggg Hi Ahning. For a assistance, kindly send your oncernthru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@itsMCatantan Hi Mhike! Kindly note that voluntary rebooking is always subject to fare difference. Be reminded that rebooking must be done 2 hours prior the scheduled departing time. Thank you

data.text: @CrustyTrade Hi Crusty! Vape/E-cigarettes are permitted for hand carry baggage. If with built in battery, please Turn it upside down and must be individually protected to prevent accidental activation. The vape juice should also not exceed 100ml per bottle. See you!
@qPartisanKeyDee Got this Krizza. Upon checking,  your case owner has sent you an email on 10/3/2022 2:40 PM. You may still send your response there.
@exoclhermes You're most welcome 🍒(๑•᎑•๑)!

@exoclhermes Hi 🍒(๑•᎑•๑). Discount for domestic travel will be assessed by system if its regular Fare. If traveling within the Philippines only, allot at least (2) hours between flights. While If connecting to or from an international flight, allot at least (3) hours between flights.
@qPartisanKeyDee Can I have your case number or chat session number with the agent Krizza so I could do a follow-up?

data.text:
@exoclhermes Hi 🍒(๑•᎑•๑)! The Senior Citizen discount does not apply to:
-Promotional fares with discount higher than 20% of the lowest Go fare
-Add-ons such as baggage allowance or inflight meals
-International flights or connecting flights with international sector
Stay safe!

data.text: @kiyanuuuh Hi K 🎀💗. We're moving all of our chat engagements. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@jendeukieluvv All perfume containers (or that of other liquids, aerosols, or gels) must also be placed in a transparent, resealable plastic bag, approximately 20cm x 20cm.
@jendeukieluvv Basis of the restriction will be container, w/c should not exceed 100ml. If the container can fit up to 200ml, even though content is only 100ml, it will not be accepted.

@jendeukieluvv Hi NINI. Perfumes & other liquids, aerosols & gels, may be allowed in hand carry provided that rules are followed: Each bottle of perfume (or other liquids, aerosols/gels) must not exceed 100ml. Each passenger may only bring up to 1L of perfume (or other liquids/aerosols/gels).
@jendeukieluvv Hi NINI! May we ask if what's inside the bottle?

data.text: @johannjaycob_ Hi Johann! E-Cigarettes or vapes are allowed in your hand carry. Please remove the batteries before packing. Stay safe!

data.text: @seokjiniieeeeee Hi 💜⁷! Hair curlers & straighteners may be packed in your hand carry. Please make sure to remove the battery (if any) before packing. Note that passengers can only bring up to one (1) curler or straightener that contain hydrocarbon gas. Hair blower are for check in only.
@tinilibin12 Hi Sminty! A foldable bicycle may be accepted for check-in as long as the tires are deflated and it's placed inside a sturdy box to avoid damages. See you on board soon!
@bluecandyboy Anytime ᜊᜓᜄ᜔ᜑᜏ᜔!
@bluecandyboy Hi ᜊᜓᜄ᜔ᜑᜏ᜔! You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Stay safe!

data.text: @bluecandyboy We will help you look into it ᜊᜓᜄ᜔ᜑᜏ᜔. For further assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@bluecandyboy Hi ᜊᜓᜄ᜔ᜑᜏ᜔. Guest has the option to pre-select a specific seat based on their preference. CEB Seat Selector is available at the time of booking and during Manage Booking up to two (2) hours before scheduled time of departure. Simply go to https://t.co/5TLfYWv7EF.
@tinilibin12 You're most welcome Sminty! Please take care!
@Optimum_Prayd_ Hi gurl. Frozen/wet food is not allowed in your checked baggage due to the possibility of leaks and foul smell in the plane. Stay safe.

@tinilibin12 Hi Sminty .Yes you may bring it but please note  that you need to avail a sports equipment allowance if you will be bringing your bicycle/s since this is on top of the prepaid baggage allowance.  For more info, please check this link (https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6).Thanks!

data.text: @Pheeeeeeeebs1 We will help you split the booking Pheeebs 💜. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@tinilibin12 Hi Sminty. CEB Sports Equipment Baggage Allowance is available at the time of booking & during Manage Booking up to 2 hrs before scheduled time of departure. If ever it is not available in ATR (DG) flights. For further assistance you may message us thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK.

@ellaaasu Hi Ella. I understand your concern, but Voter's certificate will  not accepted as valid ID for checked in. All  documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling. Yyou may check our  frequently asked questions (FAQs) via  https://t.co/lBwTdCJvJb. Thanks!
@ellaaasu You may present UMID ID too ella. See you soon!

@ellaaasu Hi there, ella! Yes, Philhealth ID (PVC type) will be accepted as Valid identification for domestic flight as long as it's valid with photo, date of of birth and signature. Remember, all documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling. Have a great day!

@ellaaasu Hi there, Ella. Barangay clearance is not a valid ID. We do suggest presenting any of these valid IDs,Company/School ID, passport, or government-issued ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth and signature. Thanks!

data.text: @SantosHailee Hi hailee. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@ellaaasu Hi Ella. Philhealth ID (PVC type) will be accepted as Valid identification for domestic flight. However, Voters Certificate is not accepted as Valid ID. Hope this helps.  Have a great day ahead!
